text: Condamine Farms is a rural locality in the Toowoomba Region, Queensland, Australia. In the , Condamine Farms had a population of 23 people. == Geography == The land is mostly undeveloped. The predominant land use is grazing with some cropping. == History == The locality was named for being in the vicinity of the Condamine River, although the river flows approx to the north-east of the locality. == Education == There are no schools in Condamine Farms. The nearest primary and secondary school to Year 10 is in Millmerran and the nearest secondary school to Year 12 in is Pittsworth. == References == Category:Toowoomba Region Category:Localities in Queensland
title: Condamine Farms, Queensland
